main event: In Kokomo, Indiana on July 7, 1957, military personnel observed two round objects with six or seven different colors, which appeared to stop, hover, and then accelerate at great speeds for 37 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were seen for a significant duration of 37 minutes.
They displayed variable colors, changing between six or seven different colors.
The report indicates that there were no photographs included in the document.
The conclusion of the report speculates that the sighting was probably caused by a balloon, although there were no details or evidence to support this claim.
The document categorizes the sighting as 'Unknown' due to insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: Two round objects with variable colors
